title: Courtyard of Al-Azhar Mosque
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: No.2112. MOSQUÉE El AZHAR (LA COUPOL & LES MINARETS VUE DE LA COUR). Translation of photographer's description: No. 2112. El Azhar Mosque (The Dome & The Minarets view from court). Collector's note: Minaret dates from Kait Bey (1468-96).
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
